Author: zvisha
Title: [ANN][ICO] Confideal | Smart contracts management service and arbitration module
Body: GUYS! WE HAVE AN IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT!  CONFIDEAL, A SMART CONTRACT PLATFORM, STARTS A SMARTER ICO.  Our ICO campaign failed and raised 303 ETH out of 70,000 planned, in spite of the functional product, wide media coverage, and good ratings.   The main reason, which is clear and which would prevent ourselves from investing in any ICO, is loss of trust. The market that used to be overheated three months ago is now shrinking. The risk of investing in a fraudulent project can now be compared to driving on a one-lane mountain road in the dark with the lights turned off: it’s not that you are doomed, but are likely to get into trouble. Investors’ skepticism toward projects has contributed to the market decline even more than ICO ban in certain countries. Although we are trying to be as transparent as it gets, it will take the community long to find an antidote against “toxic” projects like Tezos or Confido and to start regulating ICO’s in a safer and a more efficient way.   At the same time, the “exhaustive funding” strategy that we chose for our roadmap was perceived unfavorably for two reasons: first of all, overfunding would have hampered the growth of our token’s value on the market, and second, such request for abundant funds could have aroused suspicions in our acting bona fide.  5 days ago our investors received an e-mail with the instruction how can they retrieve their funds. Meanwhile the team is working on their mistakes in order to launch a smarter campaign.  Although our first ICO has failed, we received so many words of support and our belief in our project is so strong that we keep on fighting for the future of Confideal.  If you want to keep in touch with our team and the whole community, please join our Telegram chat: t.me/confidealioeng

Title: [ANN][ICO] Confideal | Smart contracts management service and arbitration module
Body: No, first of all, you need an Ethereum wallet. If you don’t have one, you should set up one. There are many tools and apps for that. But you need a wallet that supports all ERC-20 tokens and of which only you have the private key. Now you can actually start using your wallet. To participate in Confideal token sale you need Ether. In order to fill your wallet with Ether, you will need a cryptocurrency exchange. There are many exchanges out there, such as Coinbase, Kraken, Bitfinex, Bittrex, and much more. Some of these allow you to trade fiat currency (dollars or euro) for Ethereum directly, while others only allow exchanging Bitcoin (BTC) or another cryptocurrency to ETH. Author: zvisha
Title: [ANN][ICO] Confideal | Smart contracts management service and arbitration module
Body: Hi, Confideal resolve all key problems that exist in today’s international contractual processes trough self-programmed smart contracts based on Ethereum network! Smart contract technology represents an ideal tool for low-risk deal-making: outlined and executed by program code, the contract between the counterparties can be fulfilled or broken only in accordance with the originally established terms. The terms of a smart contract are established before the deal is made. Then their fulfillment is ensured by software code without human interference. Due to the technical specifics of the blockchain - the distributed database where the smart contract is stored - any interference aimed at changing the terms of the deal after it has been signed is nearly impossible. The Ethereum smart contract works as an “escrow agent”, a sort of bank cell, where the terms of the deal and the money (cryptocurrency) are stored until the contract is fulfilled. Moreover, the terms of the contract are available only to the counterparties themselves, and, in case of disputes, to the arbitrator.

Author: zvisha
Title: [ANN][ICO] Confideal | Smart contracts management service and arbitration module
Body: Confideal solves three key problems that exist in today’s international contractual processes: - Counterparties interaction (Contracting). The organization of international deals is an a priori more complex process than that of domestic contracts. For that reason, the partners tend to simplify the contracting process by conducting the entire workflow via the Internet. This approach creates additional risks - it becomes possible to modify contract data without the partner’s knowledge, forge signatures in   Photoshop etc. -  Foreign exchange regulations. There is a possibility of severe time delays in the countries with strict forex regulations. Delays of five or more days are quite probable, and sometimes banks can deny payment processing outright, offering no explanation. - Arbitration. In case of disputes, there can be one more type of costs: the average cost of an arbitration procedure today is 2.5 million USD, and it takes no less than 6 months to be completed. Such losses are inadmissibly expensive for SMEs (Small and Medium Enterprises). Confideal is the platform which uses the smart contract technology powered by the Ethereum blockchain to solve the principal problems bound up with modern contractual processes.

Title: [ANN][ICO] Confideal | Smart contracts management service and arbitration module
Body: 1)Counterparties interaction (Contracting). The organization of international deals is an a priori more involved process than that of domestic contracts. For that reason, the partners tend to simplify the contracting process by conducting the entire workflow via the Internet. This approach creates additional risks - it becomes possible to modify contract data without the partner’s knowledge, forge signatures in   Photoshop, etc. 2)Foreign exchange regulations. There is a possibility of severe time delays in the countries with strict forex regulations. Delays of five or more days are quite probable, and sometimes banks can deny payment   processing outright, not explain. 3)Arbitration. In case of disputes, there can be one more type of costs: the average cost of an arbitration procedure today is 2.5 million USD, and it takes no less than six months to be completed. Such losses are inadmissibly expensive for SMEs (Small and Medium Enterprises).

Author: zvisha
Title: [ANN][ICO] Confideal | Smart contracts management service and arbitration module
Body: The smart contract technology represents an ideal tool for low-risk deal-making: outlined and executed by program code, the contract between the counterparties can be fulfilled or broken only by the initially established terms. Due to the technical specifics of the blockchain - the distributed  database where the smart contract is stored - any interference aimed at  changing the terms of the deal after it has been signed is nearly impossible. The Ethereum smart contract works as an “escrow agent”, a sort of bank cell, where the terms of the deal and the money (cryptocurrency) are stored until the contract is fulfilled.  When making payments with ETH, 1% fee is applicable, 1% fee is not applicable to CDL payments, which means that the contractual service is free for CDL users.

Author: zvisha
Title: [ANN][ICO] Confideal | Smart contracts management service and arbitration module
Body: The position of each arbiter in the rating is determined by two types of factors: objective and subjective. - Objective factors: speed of response, the number of settled disputes, the completeness of disclosed information about the self. The weight of objective factors comprises 70% of the overall arbiter’s rating. - Subjective factors: votes, given to arbiters by the CDL token owners. Subjective factors comprise 30% of the arbiter’s rating.  In addition to the rating, which determines the position of every arbiter on the list of all arbiters, there is also an option to vote for arbiters using a system of “likes” and “dislikes”. This system does not affect the positions of arbiters on the list but serves as an additional, subjective measure  of the quality of their work.
